title: Kuch Rang Pyar Ke Aise Bhi
overview: Kuch Rang Pyar Ke Aise Bhi explores work in progress relationship of Dev and Sonakshi. Dev is a successful business tycoon who lives with his mother Ishwari and three sisters. Dev was only eight years old when he lost his father. His mother Ishwari had to make a lot of sacrifices for the upbringing of her children. Dev owes everything to his mother and has a feeling of indebtedness and complete devotion for her. The toughest battle anyone ever faces is the one between heart and mind. In today's practical world we make the decisions of heart also with mind. But can we truly find happiness by listening only to the mind.
